BBVAPZOA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Deuda Plazo SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
BBVAPZOA.MX.summary: The BMERPZO aims to offer investors the option of investing in securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government, the Bank of Mexico, as well as by State Governments and municipal lending institutions, corporate, domestic and foreign, live or in repurchase agreements, in pesos, UDIS and dollars. You can also invest in bank deposits of money in sight in financial institutions, in pesos or dollars. Also the Fund may invest in financial derivative instruments markets recognized values structured or backed by assets in accordance with the provisions issued by Banco de Mexico and the CNBV, in national or foreign currency-denominated. The Fund will have a medium-term investment strategy; seeking to capitalize on the movements of the market.
BBVAPZOA.MX.family: BBVA Bancomer GestiÃ³n SA de CV

SURCORPBOE4.MX.summary: INGCORP will mainly invest in a diversified portfolio of securities, securities or documents representing a debt held by a third party, mainly in securities issued by private companies of high credit quality, complemented with banking and Government, values mainly denominated in national currency, that allow to have a stable performance in the short term. The Fund is aimed at small, medium and large investors who are individuals and companies who are looking for low-risk investments.

VALUEF1A.MX.short_name: VALUE OPERADORA DE SOC DE INV F
VALUEF1A.MX.long_name: Fondo Value en Instrumentos de Deuda SA de CV S.I.I.D.P.F. A
VALUEF1A.MX.summary: Facilitate the participation of small and medium investors in the debt market, by investing in active object of investment whose nature corresponds to values, titles or documents representing a debt to a third party Manager, seeking to capitalize on market movements to obtain competitive yields.
VALUEF1A.MX.family: VALUE Operadora de S. de Inv. SA de CV

VECTCORA.MX.short_name: Vector Fondo AR, S.A. de C.V.,
VECTCORA.MX.long_name: Vector Fondo AR, S.A. de C.V., F.I.I.D. A
VECTCORA.MX.summary: The Fund aims to operate exclusively with active objects of investment in debt instruments, approved by the National Commission of banking and securities, as well as forming a securities portfolio in debt instruments that in legal systems, seeks to offer investors attractive yields in the medium and long term.
